name: DeltaBackups – backup & migration
author: DeltaBackups

sections.description:
Efficiently protect your WordPress site with DeltaBackups.
Delta versioning saves only changes since the last backup, reducing storage costs and time.
Strong encryption secures your files and database before storing them in scalable, reliable serverless cloud storage.
Seamlessly migrate your site to a new host or domain with just a few clicks.
Easily restore your WordPress site with DeltaBackups.
Choose specific versions or perform a complete site restore with just a few clicks, ensuring quick recovery and minimal downtime.
-Delta Versioning
-Encryption
-Cloud Storage
-Migration Tool
-Unlimited sites (all plans)
sections.installation:
Download, Install and Activate!

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New to find and install DeltaBackups.
  2. Or, download the latest version of the plugin, then go to Plugins > Add New and click the “Upload Plugin” button to upload your .zip file.
  3. Activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Is there a free version?

Yes, you can use Local Mode and have all your backups stored to your local file system of your WordPress instance

Does this plugin rely on any 3rd party services?

Free (Local) mode of this plugin operates entirely on your server and does not connect to any external services.
Paid version relies on cloud backend api.deltabackups.com, for safe storage of your backup data.
Feel free to check out our DeltaBackups product where you can also find Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

Does it work with WordPress Multisite?

Backup process works, but restore is still in development. You could use it to migrate your WP site from multisite to regular instance. Its still not fully tested and Multisite use is not recommended and at your own risk.

Is there a scheduling feature?

This feature is still in development, stay tuned!

Who is owner of this service and trademark? Is there a support available?

If you have any questions related to support, please reach out to support@deltabackups.com, to have a word with owner and creator of DeltaBackups, please reach out to info@zvonimirbedi.com.
It is maintained by DeltaBackups team, supported by Zvonimir Bedi
